<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.work_management.demo" name="Field Service Management Demo Data" version="1.0.0" help="CSHelp:Field-Service-Management" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="Demo" onload_demo_data="load_demo_data.js" licensable="true">
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.work_management" /> <import plugin="com.snc.wo_signature_pad" /> </requires>
<description>Demonstration data for the Field Service Management application that covers the medical and telecommunication domains. NOTE: Installing this plugin adds new Configuration Item tables and relationships to the database.</description> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Demonstration data for the Field Service Management application that covers the medical and telecommunication domains. NOTE: Installing this plugin adds new Configuration Item tables and relationships to the database.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Field-Service-Management</help> <id>com.snc.work_management.demo</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Field Service Management Demo Data</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.work_management.demo/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.work_management,com.snc.wo_signature_pad</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.work_management.demo</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>Demo</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
